New Records: West Indies were bowled out for their 4th lowest total in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Pathum Nissanka scored 54 runs off 49 balls.
Dunith Wellalage took 3 wickets for 9 runs in 4 overs.
Sri Lanka beat West Indies by 73 runs.
Maheesh Theekshana bowled Alzarri Joseph to win the match for Sri Lanka.
Matheesha Pathirana took the wicket of Rovman Powell.
Pre-Game Insights: The match started on Tuesday, 15 October 2024, at 7:00 PM (IST).
Charith Asalanka emphasized the importance of winning the toss.
Rovman Powell mentioned the opportunity to reflect on their mistakes and do well in the next game.
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka expressed happiness over winning the toss and credited Dunith Wellalage's performance.
Rovman Powell acknowledged the challenges faced by West Indies and looked forward to the decider.
Pathum Nissanka shared his special plan against spin bowlers and his target.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium, Dambulla.
The decider match is scheduled for 17 October 2024.
